title: Understanding JavaScript Runtime
excerpt: JavaScript Runtime: You must have heard people saying JavaScript is a single threaded programming language. However it is paradoxical to its nature of being asynchronous. Isn't it contradicting that the language which is single threaded can also run asynchronously? Let's discuss and understand what is the magic going on that makes JavaScript asynchronous and single threaded at the same time!
